definition: (Internet) flash sale/(sports or online gaming) rapid dispatch of an opponent
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: I'm sure the stock market question will kill whatever interest they have in you.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定，股市問題會秒殺任何對你感興趣的問題。

sentences.english: He got a house from seckilling.
But when the organization was hit by the killer and instant spike and thus injured.
sentences.chinese: 但當於組織殺手交手時被瞬間秒殺並因此受了傷。
他必須秒殺，不然就失敗。

sentences.english: He kills those who bully Orihime.
sentences.chinese: 他秒殺了哪兩個欺負織姬的女破面。
